ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of June, 1998, the Order of the Superior Court is reversed as to the proper valuation of appellant’s pension. See Gordon v. Gordon, 545 Pa. 391, 681 A.2d 732 (1996). This matter is remanded to the Delaware County Court of Common Pleas for recalculation of the value of the pension utilizing appellant’s salary on the date of separation.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
